flavorText: Warriors are combat specialists who bring their deadly skills to bear against the many foes that adventurers face in the course of their journeys.

foreignData.flavorText: Krieger sind Spezialisten für den Kampf, die ihre tödlichen Fähigkeiten gegen alle Feinde einsetzen, denen Abenteurer auf ihren Reisen begegnen.

name: Expedition Champion
originalText: Expedition Champion gets +2/+0 as long as you control another Warrior.

rulings.text: Expedition Champion gets just +2/+0, no matter how many other Warriors you control beyond the first.
